section.heading: Housing Assistance Fund.
section.text: The Housing Assistance Fund established by § 42-3403.07 [repealed] shall be administered and managed by the Office of the Tenant Advocate.

annotations.annotation: as added Oct. 1, 2007, D.C. Law 16-181, § 2(g), 53 DCR 6703
Section 5 of D.C. Law 16-181 provided: “Section 2 through 4 shall apply as of October 1, 2007.”
